item.title: [pi] EASY I THINK
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

badboyzack10:

how d i make a spec stronger for example i want to make my d bow spec stronger

Go to Model>Players>CombatAssistant.java
Now search the ID of the item
look toward the end you will see something like this

c.specAccuracy = 1.75; c.specDamage = 1.50;

Change the “c.specDamage = X;” to whatever you desire

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] EASY I THINK
item.dc:creator: @we_rushed_god we rushed god
item.description:
@we_rushed_god wrote:

[quote=“Rash, post:5, topic:396775”][quote author=we rushed god link=topic=493938.msg3611473#msg3611473 date=1306628116]

how d i make a spec stronger for example i want to make my d bow spec stronger

What you do is you go to your cfg folder, find items.java or items.class (depends on base) and hit Ctrl+F then type in Dark Bow. To the right of this should be a bunch of numbers, like item= (dark bow code) 0 0 0 -27 40 (or something like this) you want to find the highest positive number then make it even higher, and that will make it stronger I hope this helps. Rep ++ if it does plox
[/quote]

That is the bonus of the bow, he only wants the special to be stronger.

Read his fucking post.

Specials.java, find the darkbow special and increase the strength.[/quote]
flame much? its a mistake asshole…

Read full topic
